synopsis.text: Metro-erritorial mayhem ensues as Abiko Tokio, a brawny transfer student from Yamagata, steps into the bustling streets of Tokyo, eager to prove his worth and that of his hometown. However, his thirst for a good scuffle is met with an unexpected twist when he crosses paths with Japan Hinomoto, an eccentric red-haired classmate with an insatiable curiosity for his prefectural origins. This peculiar encounter plunges Tokio into a world of unparalleled lunacy, as he discovers that Japan has crafted a unique martial art, Todofu-ken, inspired by the 47 prefectures of Japan! Brace yourself for a wild, hilarious journey that takes you on an unforgettable tour of Japan, as Abiko Tokio navigates through friendships, fists, and prefectural pride in "Jimoto ga Japan."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
